thread.title: Rita Doran
thread.title_full: Voltaire Diamonds reviewed by Rita Doran

author: Rita Doran
title: Rita Doran
text:
I would like to thank Rachel for her patients and professionalism in helping us choose our ring. She was so helpful and kind, didnt rush or push us to make a decision. My experience with Volitaire Diamonds was something I will never forget or never experience again. It was such a unique experience and I thank you so much.
Rita & Paddy
